name: FoodNetworkDailyBite
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
From the most trusted source for all your food needs, Food Network is delivering bite-sized recipe tips and inspiration in your daily Amazon Flash briefing. Start your day with a healthy serving of recipe videos, food hacks, and seasonal favorites.
 
Add Food Network to your Flash briefing through the Settings in the Alexa app.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
